price: (Ayo mazi yatuye) azayengesha ibyo mu nda zabo ndetse n’impu zabo.
arabic: يُصۡهَرُ بِهِۦ مَا فِي بُطُونِهِمۡ وَٱلۡجُلُودُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yuṣ'haru bihi mā fī buṭūnihim wal-julūdu
